name: Place Holder
description:
Greetings!

Place Holder is a narrative-based game about a robot who's on a path to discover his true feelings.

The game was made in two days, in a local game jam, Frost Jam 3, hosted by ITU OTG.

How to Play?

To succeed in discovering your feelings as a robot, you talk to other entities and proceed.

When encountered with different entities, each chosen dialogue option manipulates the mood of the player. 

To successfully continue the game, you must hide your real feelings and socially camouflage against the thoughts of the person that you have encountered.

Download Instructions

Windows: After you download the .zip file, keep .pck and .exe files together, then open PlaceHolder.exe, that's all!

Controls

Here is the list of essential controls.

Navigation: LMB

Movement: W, A, S, D

Dialogue Selection: 1, 2, 3

Pause: P
